timeline.bodyText:
Wouldn't it be better to

iterate through the param list and identify


all included record params of a closed record type
the single included record param of an open record type, if present


then iterate through the named args and add to the relevant records based on the expected names?


if the name is present in a particular included record param, and the type is not a subtype of never, the field belongs to that record
if the name is present in a particular included record param, and the type is a subtype of never, the field does not belongs to that record
if the name is not present in a particular included record param, and it is an open record, the field belongs to that record
